title: MIMA Yearbook. Vol. 1
creator_contributor_role: Modern Image Makers Association, production company
abstract: Fun radio (5 min. 1963)--House with a secret (5 min. 1964)--The Mystical rose (6 min. 1976)--Abstract film (2 min. 1980)--November 11 (4 min. 1979)--Zoom film (5 min. 1978)--Video as art. Part 2: Leash control (3 min. 1979)--Train fixation 5 min. 1977)--Moods: 'for Ives and Jobim' (6 min. 1979)--The Waif (5 min. 1980)--Glaring in secret (4 min. 1979)--Cross sections (5 min. 1977)
description: Volume one of a three volume set, this video compilation of excerpts from Australian film and video art covers the period from 1962-1980, and is a unique and tantalising entry into the non-mainstream history of Australian film and video.
